title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.453 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 255.453 - General

State Regulations

Each operator shall establish procedures as required by
section
255.605
(b) of
this Part to implement these requirements. These procedures, including those
for the design, installation, operation and maintenance of cathodic protection
systems, must be carried out by, or under the direction of, a person qualified
by experience and training in pipeline corrosion control
methods. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
255.453

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
